title: Finalizing a Vehicle Sale
description: A customer has agreed to purchase a vehicle and needs to complete the final paperwork.

tasks.description: Generate the final bill of sale, including the vehicle price, taxes, title, and license fees.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates an accurate and complete bill of sale.

tasks.description: Present the financing or lease agreement to the customer and obtain their signature on all required documents.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly explains the documents and obtains all necessary signatures.
Agent successfully processes the payment via credit card or check.
